div.p: Y94/4140, unit 818, VPRS 3992/P inward registered correspondence, VA 475 Chief Secretary's Department, Public Record Office, Victoria.
Ch. Topp Esqr M.A., F.L.S., LL.B. &c

I have the honor ,to acknowledge the receipt of your communication of the 6th instant,
See C. Topp to M, 6 June 1894. informing me, that H. Exc.
His Excellency. the Governor in Council had been pleased, to sanction my continuing in office for the next six months. As on former occasions I am impressed with this exceptional favor shown me, and while expressing my best thanks to the Government I beg to assure especially the honorable the Premier and Chief Secretary, that I shall leave nothing undone also during the next half year to merit the confidence shown me, and I trust, that by the mercy of divine providence I may continue in health and strength even for some few years longer for serving in my branch of the public service our fellow-Colonists still further.
